values:
I want a Hippo.
I want to be friends.
I want Woz.
I want peace.
I want Dignity.
I want understanding.


I have
Two People, but I wouldn't give them up for the world.

Those two... They know who they are. Well sort of.

Heather + Jessie. The only people I need. I wish I had others. But I don't. I can get along with them. I love them. They are my friends. Forever more.

Why care about people, when they wont give you a thought?

Well the day started off horrible, but it picked up later on ^_^. Talked to Mathew some more today, He's pretty nice... Wierd but that's okay, since I'm not all normal myself xP. He asked me to hang out with him, but I would have had to skip desert which was soooooooo good. Yeah... Other than that today was pretty normal... Oh, Talked to Shawn he wants to be friend. That's awesome  for me ^_^.
WOW TODAY WINS AN AWARD= LAMEST DAY EVER. I'M AMAZED I MADE IT THROUGH THE DAY WITHOUT DYING OF PURE BOREDOM. SHEESH GOOD THING ITS ALMOST OVER. IM SO DAMN BORED.

This is from yesterday, when I was in my bed:

>>>Well today started off fairly well... Cousins came over, they're cute. Especially Sarah. Anyways, woke up around 9 and cleaned until 11:30, then I went ton the computer and talked to Shawn + Played GB with michelle unitl 4ish. I don't remember when I started talking to Ben, but when he said I was just using him for his GB account, I almost cried. If he thinks thats why I'm his friend then let him. I don't care right now. Whatever. Anyways the reason I'm in a bad mood is because of Josh. He was being such a jerk, I felt like slapping him. Then Morg tipped me over the edge. I am sooooo glad that Shawn left before all this happened, I would have been so mean to him, I know it. And the last thing I want right now is for him to hate me. I love him so much. Poor Steve too. I took it out on him, and again I go back to me not deserving to have any friends. I'm such a bad person. I wish I could be the scapegoat. I would sacrafice myself for the well being of everyone else hands down, no questions asked. Its just to rough. I want to give up, but I want to succed. I want to be successful. I am going to make a differece. 

I have a lot of apologizing to do tomorrow. I hope I can get through the day.

Wheeeeee

Man, this week is off to the worst start. The only good news I have is the fact that my mom came back Monday, and Jessie is coming over tomorrow.

Bad news- Ends up, I didn't get to go to see Finger Eleven with Ben. I was so dissapointed. I really wanted to go... Oh well I guess... We can do other things.

Bad news 2- Broke up with Shawn... Very depressing. I can't do anything right.

Bad news 3- Since my mom just got back, she's decided my dad needs a vacation! So she's taking him to Las Vegas... That's 4 Vacations for her within 6 months!! Like she was JUST at Hawaii. How unfair >>.

Yeah that's about it right now, hopefully nothing else bad happens. Don't think I could handle it.
Gots me a new friend. His name is Ben. He's really nice and he's cute too ^_^. He asked me to go to see Finger Eleven with him on Monday, so hopefully I can find a ride. ^^

Wow, today was a wierd day. Went to see Spiderman 2, it's an awesome movie, too bad Venom or Carnage wasn't in it. They're the best villans ever. Anyways, got back home talked to some people. Cody's back from I forget where (What a great friend I am). Yeah. Everyone's just happy so I'm really happy because everyone else is happy ^^. Today was Morgoth's birthday, but I never got to see him to give him the thing I made. Kind of depressing but oh well I'll see him later. Oh yes, Heather's dad got married today to ^^ I wish him and Lynne good luck with that and good luck to Heather too because her step sister/brother are wierd o_O, not good wierd either. Yeah anyways, Just read Nappa's Journal and hearing that he was happy just topped off my mood ^^
I don't know what to do... I'm so confused an alone right now... I just...

Wrote this early this morning in my notebook so I'm going to transfer it:

So here I am laying in my bed at 1:42 writing this. Why? Because I have 4 people on my mind that I want to talk to. Let me explain to you who they are and why:

Person number one: The Woz. Why? Because I wanna know how she's doing and what she's been up to. 

Person number two: Chris. Why? Because I love talking to him and he always puts me in a good mood, and I could really use one of those right now.

Person Number three: Steve.  I enjoy talking to him. He always has something nice to say. 

Yeah... Im j ust going to leave out the other person. They'd know who they are...;o

So far today is off to a lame start. I'm so pissed I can't find episode 25 of .Hack//Sign. It's making me so mad, I really want it. My internet is acting all wierd to. But hey, I'd rather sit here than go sit in the heat making a garage with other idiots- Did that yesterday- Oi Oi

Finally... Stupid exams are almost over just one more on Monday. Today was the science test. It was so boring I finished with an hour left e.e I'm so tired right now, I stayed up until 5 studying, then I had to wake up at 7 ;o. Now tomorrow, I have to go help some friends build their garage. ;o Bo-ring.

Today was soooooooooooo boring. Had a math final, it was so easy. I'm pretty sure I aced it. When I got home I went online and talked to my friends. Pretty boring day...

 At like 5 Shawn asked me out which is pretty much the highlight of my day xD. That made me so happy...

Now i'm going to make dinner for my brothers. ;o
Later
